sentences.sContent: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.sCn: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

sentences.sContent: ...Sometimes its employees are released from their daily jobs for weeks and spend their time interacting in the innovation facility instead...
...What kind of care facility old people live in may be less important than we think...
...How a resident feels depends on an interaction between themselves and the care facility they live in...
...It also has a special innovation facility for its employees...
...A resident’s satisfaction with a care facility has much to do with whether they had participated in the decision to move in and how long they had stayed there...
...That day he ran into a roll-up door at the Lummis facility in Valero...

trans.tranOther: Facilities are buildings, pieces of equipment, or services that are provided for a particular purpose
